title: Medical Practitioner visa (subclass 422)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== ​This visa is closed to new applications. Medical Practitioner visa (subclass 422) Page Content ​​​​You cannot apply for this visa. Check the visa finder tool to see which visa you can apply for. Visa holders Details How long your visa lasts Details This visa allows you and any family members who have also been granted the visa to: work in Australia for up to four years bring your family with you to Australia – they can work and study travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid. Your obligations Details You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws. Work in Australia Details You must: not stop being employed by the employer who sponsored you for the visa not work in a position or occupation that is inconsistent with the one for which your visa was granted. If your employment ends, you must do one of the following: find another employer who is willing to sponsor you for another appropriate visa (except for a Medical Practitioner (subclass 422) visa) apply for another type of visa leave Australia before your visa ends. Private health insurance Details You are responsible for all your health costs while you are in Australia. You and your family must have adequate private medical and hospital health insurance for the time you are in Australia unless your country has a reciprocal health care agreement with Australia and you are enrolled with Medicare. . You can use an insurance company from in or outside Australia. Taxation requirements Details You must comply with Australia’s taxation law if you work in Australia. The Australian Taxation Office's website has more information. Tell us if things change Details Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include: changes to your phone number, email, address or passport changes to your relationship status the birth of a child. See how to let us know if there is a change in your situation If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane. Adding a dependent Details If you need to add a dependent to your visa, you will need to contact the responsible processing centre The processing centre in Melbourne CBD is responsible for the following states: Northern Territory South Australia Tasmania and Victoria The processing center for Perth is responsible for the following states: Western Australia The Processing center for Sydney CBD is responsible for the following states: New South Wales South Australia Australian Capital Territory Sponsors Details How long the sponsorship lasts Details Your sponsorship of the medical practitioner lasts for the duration of their visa. Contact information Details If sponsorship information needs to be updated contact the responsible processing centre The processing centre in Melbourne CBD is responsible for the following states: Northern Territory South Australia Tasmania and Victoria The processing center for Perth is responsible for the following states: Western Australia The Processing center for Sydney CBD is responsible for the following states: New South Wales South Australia Australian Capital Territory

===== main placeholder ==========================================

​This visa is closed to new applications.

​This visa is closed to new applications.

# Medical Practitioner visa (subclass 422)

Medical Practitioner visa (subclass 422)
Page Content

​​​​You cannot apply for this visa.

​​​​You cannot apply for this visa.

Check thevisa finder toolto see which visa you can apply for.

Check the
visa finder tool
to see which visa you can apply for.

## Visa holders

Visa holders
Details

### How long your visa lasts

How long your visa lasts
Details

This visa allows you and any family members who have also been granted the visa to:

This visa allows you and any family members who have also been granted the visa to:
- work in Australia for up to four years
work in Australia for up to four years
- bring your family with you to Australia – they can work and study
bring your family with you to Australia – they can work and study
- travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid.
travel in and out of Australia any number of times as long as the visa is valid.

### Your obligations

Your obligations
Details

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

You and your family must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.

#### Work in Australia

Work in Australia
Details

You must:

You must:
- not stop being employed by the employer who sponsored you for the visa
not stop being employed by the employer who sponsored you for the visa
- not work in a position or occupation that is inconsistent with the one for which your visa was granted.
not work in a position or occupation that is inconsistent with the one for which your visa was granted.

If your employment ends, you must do one of the following:

If your employment ends, you must do one of the following:
- find another employer who is willing to sponsor you for another appropriate visa (except for a Medical Practitioner (subclass 422) visa)
find another employer who is willing to sponsor you for another appropriate visa (except for a Medical Practitioner (subclass 422) visa)
- apply for another type of visa
apply for another type of visa
- leave Australia before your visa ends.
leave Australia before your visa ends.

#### Private health insurance

Private health insurance
Details

You are responsible for all your health costs while you are in Australia. You and your family must have adequate private medical and hospital health insurance for the time you are in Australia unless your country has areciprocal health care agreementwith Australia and you are enrolled withMedicare.. You can use an insurance company from in or outside Australia.

You are responsible for all your health costs while you are in Australia. You and your family must have adequate private medical and hospital health insurance for the time you are in Australia unless your country has a
reciprocal health care agreement
with Australia and you are enrolled with
Medicare.
. You can use an insurance company from in or outside Australia.

#### Taxation requirements

Taxation requirements
Details

You must comply with Australia’s taxation law if you work in Australia. TheAustralian Taxation Office's websitehas more information.

You must comply with Australia’s taxation law if you work in Australia. The
Australian Taxation Office's website
has more information.

### Tell us if things change

Tell us if things change
Details

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:
- changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
- changes to your relationship status
changes to your relationship status
- the birth of a child.
the birth of a child.

See how to let us know if there is achange in your situation.

See how to let us know if there is a
change in your situation
.

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.

### Adding a dependent

Adding a dependent
Details

If you need to add a dependent to your visa, you will need to contact theresponsible processing centre.

If you need to add a dependent to your visa, you will need to contact the
responsible processing centre
.

The processing centre in Melbourne CBD is responsible for the following states:

The processing centre in Melbourne CBD is responsible for the following states:
- Northern Territory
Northern Territory

South Australia

Sponsors

How long the sponsorship lasts
Details

Your sponsorship of the medical practitioner lasts for the duration of their visa.

Your sponsorship of the medical practitioner lasts for the duration of their visa.
